item.title: Senior SQL Server DBA (mountain view)
item.description:
Directions:
1. Please contact daniel.chin@rht.com for all responses
2. Include your updated resume in Word Format
3. Please list your work authorization in the U.S.

Solid publicly traded corporation is looking for a Senior SQL Server DBA with good production experience with SQL Server 2005.

- Expert level with SQK Server 2005 Enterprise Edition
- Oracle DBA experience is a plus
- 7-8 years exp. Production
- Maintenance and QA in this role
- Clustering experience is a must
- Tasked with day to day maintenance and eventually take over more sites.
- SQL environment is 85 servers
- Oracle environment is 2 servers
- On windows and unix platform

Daniel Chin
Account Executive
Robert Half Technology
Daniel.Chin@rht.com
www.RHT.com
item.dc:title: Senior SQL Server DBA (mountain view)
